text: Aey Nabi, tumse pehle hum bahut se Rasool bhej chuke hain jinmein se baaz ke haalat humne tumko bataye hain aur baaz ke nahin bataye. Kisi Rasool ki bhi yeh taaqat na thi ke Allah ke izan ke bagair khud koi nishani le aata. Phir jab Allah ka hukum aa gaya to haqq ke mutabiq faisla kardiya gaya aur us waqt galat-kaar log khasare (loss) mein padh gaye
